WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is fixed in our latest bits. You'll see it working when we refresh the Playground with the next public TypeScript release.
WorkItem.Description:
Ctrl+Ins = Copy - works fine
Shift+Ins = Paste - works fine
Shift+Del = Cut - broken

I'm primarily using Chrome, but this also reproduces on IE.
WorkItem.Summary: Shift+Delete keyboard shortcut in TypeScript playground broken

Comments.Message: Thanks for the report. We'll take a look.
